channel.title: If player has less than 129m

item.title: If player has less than 129m
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

    if (!itemInInventoryMethod(995, 1290000000) {
        // The user does not have enough money.
    } else {
        // Here do what the user does if they have the money.
    }

Example,

	if (!player.getInventory().playerHasItem(995, cost)) {
	    player.sendMessage("You can't afford to do this.");
	} else {
	    if (CHANCE_OF_WINNING <= random(100)) {
		player.getItems().addItem(995, cost);
		player.sendMessage("Congratulations, you have won " + cost + " coins!");
		return;
	    }
	    player.sendMessage("Unlucky, you lose " + cost + " coins.");
	    player.getInventory().removeItem(995, cost);
	}

Read full topic

item.title: If player has less than 129m
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You didn’t “forget” how to do it, you never knew how to do it. Don’t be afraid to say “I don’t know how to compare variables”.

I would suggest reading the Java tutorials.
